attributes.review: okay so i downloaded and all of a sudden, my house disappeared. like wth. so i took my nemo on a walk with me and we went to gucci to look for my house and they told me my house wasn’t there. so then later that day me and nemo got hungry so we went to eat. nemo ate dory and i ate some dog food. so when we were finished, me and nemo went on a hunt to go find my house. me and nemo never found my house so we put out missing papers that my house was missing. then someone called us that they found my house but a lizard ate it. so me and nemo had to go find another place to live at. unfortunately we didn’t find a place. so me and nemo decided we wanted to go shopping. so we both went to the schrute farm and our friend Dwight told us we can stay at his place. so me and nemo just started living there. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT YOUR HOUSE TO DISSAPEAR!!!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD!

attributes.review: This app has a very very very bad virus on it that installs itself into the software of your phone and sometimes even your life... racism. My phone was in complete shambles, I couldn’t even tap on my home page without the app pulling up something completely inappropriate. It’s literally nude racism. And the worst part is, once it got to my phone it broadcasted to the media and infected other people and I’m not sure that it can be cured, but I hope it can. I’ve heard that sometimes, the infection can be lethal. So, for the safety of our people... all people in this country, we need to protect our citizens by removing this vile excuse for an app.. before it’s too late. People. Will. Die. And I simply won’t let that happen knowing that I can help. Please stop this before more people get hurt... before more loved ones are dead.
attributes.title: It has a virus on it!!!!

attributes.title: Why is there baby hand  Cheetos on the screen

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see when the next rally’s would be and stuff. When I opened the app it showed me a picture of a dog in the middle of pooping! My eyes then refused to look at my phone so I turned my phone off. Later that day I decided to give the app another shot. So once again I opened the app and this time there was no picture. There was just this random game that popped up on my screen and it would not let me leave the app, turn my phone off, or shut it down! So at that point I was panicking so I decided to play the game. The game was brick and balls and I just played the first level and then the same picture of a dog pooping popped up on my screen! So now the app was letting my turn the app off so I left the app and immediately deleted it. DO NOT download this app it is a waste of time and not worth it!!!!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE app!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I opened this app to see a carrot with bleached leaves cry, I don’t understand how he can make America great again when he can’t make his hair look great again that thing is horrendous, I never knew ones ends could be so split even my parents aren’t that divorced. 🤢🤮 donkey trump needs to stop drinking carrot juice even the girls at my sorority aren’t that orange honestly with all that money I still don’t know why he won’t get a good quality spray tan he’s a billionaire for gods sake. Maybe if he wouldn’t spend all his money of rallies and if he didn’t spend all his money on little kids then he would look half as decent. He can’t lead America he can’t make a decent app and he looks horrible. Overall experience 1/10 the reason this doesn’t get 0/10 is because blue is my favorite color 🥱
attributes.title: Apple really needs to add a feature for zero starts

attributes.review: I understand if you have confidence in yourself. But this just feels like too much. My boyfriend downloaded this onto my phone since he is a supporter. I tried to keep an open mind so I didn’t think much of it. However, when I went into the app, it was a hypothetical slap in the face. I felt I was just being bombarded with trump everything. Which is to be expected when you get an app about someone. But my thoughts were that it was going to be news on his campaign, maybe some plans he had to help with the immigrant kids, the onslaught of the global pandemic. But what I got was something completely and utterly different. If you want to get an app that shows that our president who is a narcissistic person then get this on. But if you’re looking for news and simple other things look far, far elsewhere.
attributes.title: Too Much
